title: The Modern's Beneventano Recipe
full_text:
The Modern's Beneventano Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Aperol
1 1/2
ounces
Zucca Rabarbaro Amaro
1/2
ounce
Strega
Splash
soda
Garnish:
Orange wedge
Directions
Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add Aperol, Zucca, and Strega, stir well. Fill a rocks glass with ice. Strain Aperol mixture into serving glass, top with soda, and garnish with orange wedge.
Special equipment
Mixing glass and cocktail strainer
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
